function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Sharing of unverified information","Impact":"Spread of misinformation and panic","Mitigation":"Encourage fact-checking and critical thinking","Technologies":"Fact-checking tools, education campaigns","People":"General public","Owner":"Education institutions, media organizations"},{"Description":"Cyberchondria","Impact":"Increased anxiety and unnecessary health concerns","Mitigation":"Promote reliable health information sources and mental health support","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mental health apps","People":"General public","Owner":"Health organizations, mental health professionals"},{"Description":"Age moderating the relationship between information overload and sharing of COVID-19 misinformation","Impact":"Increased susceptibility of younger people to misinformation","Mitigation":"Targeted education on critical information evaluation","Technologies":"Online educational resources, social media literacy programs","People":"Younger population","Owner":"Education institutions, social media platforms"}]}
